    ReviewScroll - Class in proiect.claseUser
    The ReviewScroll class is a custom extension of the ScrollPane that acts as a container for displaying user reviews associated with a specific book.

    Creates an instance of the ReviewScroll class, which is a customized ScrollPane designed to display book reviews.
